content.text: Match ends, Real Madrid 7, Málaga 0.
Second Half ends, Real Madrid 7, Málaga 0.
Offside, Real Madrid. Sergio Ramos tries a through ball, but Sergio Canales is caught offside.
Ignacio Camacho (Málaga) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Fernando Gago (Real Madrid).
Attempt missed. Marcelo (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Emmanuel Adebayor.
Cala went off injured after Málaga had used all subs.
Foul by Marcelo (Real Madrid).
Sebastián Fernández (Málaga) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Cristiano Ronaldo went off injured after Real Madrid had used all subs.
Goal!  Real Madrid 7, Málaga 0. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) right footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Sergio Canales with a cross.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Cala (Málaga) because of an injury.
Lass Diarra (Real Madrid) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Sebastián Fernández (Málaga).
Foul by Fernando Gago (Real Madrid).
Sandro Silva (Málaga) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Willy Caballero (Málaga) because of an injury.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Willy Caballero.
Attempt saved. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the bottom right corner.
Attempt saved. Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Emmanuel Adebayor with a cross.
Substitution, Málaga. Cala replaces Quincy Owusu-Abeyie.
Goal!  Real Madrid 6, Málaga 0. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Second yellow card to Manolo Gaspar (Málaga) for hand ball.
Penalty conceded by Manolo Gaspar (Málaga) with a hand ball in the penalty area.
Lass Diarra (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sebastián Fernández (Málaga).
Attempt missed. Sebastián Fernández (Málaga) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Quincy Owusu-Abeyie with a through ball.
Substitution, Málaga. Sebastián Fernández replaces Juanmi.
Substitution, Málaga. Kris Stadsgaard replaces Martín Demichelis.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Sergio Canales replaces Mesut Özil.
Goal!  Real Madrid 5, Málaga 0. Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) header from the right side of the six yard box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Marcelo with a cross.
Manolo Gaspar (Málaga) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Manolo Gaspar (Málaga).
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Hand ball by Raúl Albiol (Real Madrid).
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Willy Caballero.
Attempt saved. Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Marcelo.
Foul by Ignacio Camacho (Málaga).
Mesut Özil (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Emmanuel Adebayor replaces Ángel Di María.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Fernando Gago replaces Xabi Alonso.
Attempt saved. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Sergio Ramos.
Raúl Albiol (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Juanmi (Málaga).
Eliseu (Málaga) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Raúl Albiol (Real Madrid).
Goal!  Real Madrid 4, Málaga 0. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Mesut Özil.
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Weligton (Málaga).
Attempt missed. Lass Diarra (Real Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Karim Benzema.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Willy Caballero.
Attempt saved. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Ángel Di María.

Attempt missed. Quincy Owusu-Abeyie (Málaga) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Eliseu following a set piece situation.
